artist: Painter: After Guido Reni; Engraver: John Corner; Publisher: Longman, Hurst, Rees, Orme, and Brown London
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

Below image in black: Ipse   Corner inc't / GUIDO / London, Published Jan'y 1, 1821 for the Proprietor by Longman, Hurst, Rees, Orme & Brown / and Baynes, & Son Paternoster Row | in pencil on sheet 2-281
title: Guido
